name: Geomies
description:
Game:

  • Geomies is a solo puzzle game where the Player needs to coordinate families to find their right home before the time limit hits 0. 
  • The respective shape of a family member demands the same shape through one furniture. 
  • The game is only playable with the mouse. You can also control the camera with the mouse wheel and drag it by holding the mouse left click + moving mouse.  The main core control of the game is to press (mouse left-click) the path for families to swap houses. The swapping and their reaction is instant! So you can take your time or go fast along your decisions. 
  • - HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED -
  • - Made at Global Game Jam 2019. (48 hours) - 

Thematic:

  • Home (What's your Home?)

Diversifiers:

  • Language-Independence - (Sponsored by Valve Software) - Create a game that can be understood regardless of which language the player speaks
  • Thomas Wasn't Alone - Use only simple shapes (cubes, triangles, circles, etc.) to represent every single element (characters, HUD, etc.) inside the game.
  • In Ink - Use only black and white colours in your design. There should be no other colours, not even grey.

Changes from the GGJ Prototype:

  • Tweaked the balancing of the timer to be exponential with difficulty

Platforms: 

  • MS Windows

Tools And Technologies: 

  • Unreal Engine

Technology Notes:
